narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ou Health Partners, INC is a Clinic/Center, Multi-Specialty provider based in Oklahoma City, OK. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $118.6M in Medicaid payments across 1.2M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $118.6M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,822 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
